description.value:
A superposition belt contains a series of conductive filaments attached to a small, sturdy container that holds material collected from a quantum slime. When worn, you can activate the belt as a standard action to teleport yourself to a square 30 feet away to which you have line of sight. After using this item, you canâ€™t take any other actions until your next turn, but you gain the benefits of displacement until the end of your next turn.

A superposition belt uses a battery, and each use consumes 2 charges.

Usage  2/use
